name: preact-responder-event-plugin
description: a library combine react-native-web and preact together
author: johnny

scripts.dev: microbundle watch --raw --external preact --format es && microbundle watch --raw --external preact --format es --output src --no-compress
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn update-mangle && microbundle build --raw --external preact --format es && microbundle build --raw --external preact --format es --output src/index.js --no-compress --no-sourcemap && mv src/index.d.ts ./ && rm dist/index.d.ts
